snippet: Chris Quinn remembers the moment vividly. Quinn was with the San Antonio Spurs, and can still see Tim Duncan sacrificing his body and diving out of bounds in a spectacular effort to keep a ball in play....
lead_paragraph: Chris Quinn remembers the moment vividly. Quinn was with the San Antonio Spurs, and can still see Tim Duncan sacrificing his body and diving out of bounds in a spectacular effort to keep a ball in play.

headline.main: 'Say It Ain't So!': The NBA Reacts to Duncan's Retirement
headline.print_headline: 'Say It Ain't So!': The NBA Reacts to Duncan's Retirement
